profile.name: Diego Bartels
profile.headline: Director, Strategy & Business Consulting Latam at Bayer
profile.summary:
Global executive passionate about Technology and Agriculture, Diego Bartels currently leads the Latin America branch of Bayer's Strategy & Business Consulting department (Bayer´s global Chief Strategy Officer team). Previously, he spent 10 years working in consulting, first at McKinsey and later at BCG. Trained as a Computer Engineer by the Brazilian Military Academy of Engineering (IME), Diego started his career as a software developer, first at Morning Star Consulting and then at IBM. Later, he earned an MBA degree from Stanford Graduate School of Business and an MS degree focused in Sustainable Agriculture & Land Use from Stanford School of Earth, Energy and Environmental Sciences.

Diego is deeply interested in the diversity of cultures in the world. He has already worked in countries of every inhabited continent of the world (Brazil, USA, Angola, Austria, South Korea, Australia, Bhutan, Saudi Arabia, Canada), experiencing a broad variety of business environments and ways of thinking. Additionally, he uses his free time to deepen his knowledge in the subject, having already visited more than 50 countries around the Globe.

jobs.title: Bayer
jobs.description: Leads the Latin American office of the Strategy & Business Consulting department of Bayer (Bayer’s global Chief Strategy Officer team). Responsible for supporting Bayer's businesses (Crop Science, Animal Health, Pharmaceuticals, Consumer Health, Radiology, Environmental Science) and Bayer's support platforms on strategy implementation, organizational design and efficiency improvement projects.

profile.name: Fábio Rafael Caneppele Ullmann
profile.headline: Account Manager - Banking and Financial Markets
profile.summary:
Account manager for banks, credit unions and financial markets, responsible for a long-term relationship between IBM and customers. I have the responsibility to develop new business and ensure customer satisfaction (NPS) for projects already sold, manage forecast and discovery opportunities focusing on clients goals and needs.

Speaker in topics like fintechs, digital transformation, blockchain and digital revolution, exponential organizations. Leadership of multi-cultural and multi-functional teams.

Skills: Financial Markets, IT, NLP, coach, cognitive computing, blockchain, analytics, consulting, fintechs, training, customer care, marketing and strategic planning.

Experience in IT governance, strategic planning, CapEx and OpEx projects valuation (NPV, IRR, Payback), executive reports and KPI's, and budgeting process. Development of IT efficiency and transformation projects.
